name: Blocky Motorbikes . Crazy GP Motorbike Racing Game
name_original: Blocky Motorbikes . Crazy GP Motorbike Racing Game
description:
There is a parallel championship in the motorbikes world. The Blocky Motorcycle races!

Become the world leader in this type of races and create your own style!

Choose from the available pixel motorbikes and dodge the opponents like a world champion.

Do not crash your bike cause it will eliminate you and make your race come to an end!

Watch out for the motorcycles that appear spontaneously!

Focus on the motorbike race and be ready to beat your rivals!

Stay tuned to our social media pages to be the first to download our new games!

Follow us on Twitter: @LabCave
Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/LabCaveGames
